amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to strike National Network Grants.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for National Network Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by $776,376,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 297 (Roll no. 604).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 297 (Roll no. 604).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
